renewed-contributions.title: Girl in Hiding
renewed-contributions.note: This is misfiled in the 1977 January-June CCE in Periodicals, listed as a renewal for a periodical titled 'Girl in Hiding', instead of as a renewal for an installment of a story by that name that appeared in the Saturday Evening Post issue with the indicated issue date and number.
